channel.title: Theoretical Computer Science on Mathieu @ ULaval
channel.description: Recent content in Theoretical Computer Science on Mathieu @ ULaval

item.title: LSFM
item.description: I’m thrilled to join the LSFM research group for this summer under the supervision of Jules Desharnais. Their interests lies in languages, semantics, formal and algebraic methods. I couldn’t ask for a better first research experience!
